name: IconPackager Theme File
summary: Learn about .IP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IP files are compressed using Zip compression. They can contain an .ICONPACKAGE file along with either multiple .ICO files or a single .ICL file.

description: Collection or "package" of icons saved as a desktop theme by IconPackager; can be used to replace most of Windows' standard icons with custom variations; may contain anywhere from only a few icons to more than a hundred.
